Name: H1DR2c
Desc: Half Diagonal Reel on the first diagonal, end facing second corner.
CriptDesc: {Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to {EndPos}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to face {Face}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to face {Face}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to {EndPos}
